text: If South Africa is serious about supplying anti-pandemic vaccines in future, it needs to rethink the scale of financial, technical+strategic investment into #vaccine production, UCT's Frank Kirstein + SU's Jeffrey Dorfman say. https://t.co/JwKhmzWxDo #COVID19 #Biovac @aspenpharma https://t.co/Qy7yHAXfMv
